contentrichtext.text: {{Japanese name|Komori}} {{Nihongo|'''Yōichi Komori'''|小森 陽一|''Komori Yōichi''|extra=born May 14, 1953 in [[Tokyo]], [[Japan]]}} is a critic of [[Japanese Literature|Japanese Modern Literature]].<ref>{{Cite web|url=http://www.gmw.cn/02blqs/2007-06/07/content_650201.htm|title=日本后现代批评的兴起和知识界的"向左转"|date=2007-06-07|accessdate=2010-11-25|language=Japanese}}</ref><ref name=news163>{{Cite web|url=http://news.163.com/07/1210/16/3VC62VT7000120GU.html|title=村上春树“误读”百分百：译者理解迥异|date=2007-12-10|accessdate=2010-11-25|language=Japanese}}</ref> He is also known for his approaches on [[Natsume Sōseki]] and other major Japanese literati.<ref>{{Cite web|url=http://book.ifeng.com/lianzai/detail_2008_11/24/290783_38.shtml|title=日本人的幼稚|accessdate=2010-11-25|language=Japanese}}</ref> Komori is a [[professor]] at the [[University of Tokyo]].<ref name=news163/> ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== {{Portal|Japan|Biography|University}} * [http://www.iwanami.co.jp/english/sh0209.html The Cultural History of Modern Japan [Iwanami Lecture Series]] at iwanami.co.jp {{Persondata | NAME = Komori Yoichi | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = | DATE OF BIRTH = 1953 | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Komori, Yoichi}} [[Category:1953 births]] [[Category:Japanese academics]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:Japanese literary critics]] {{Japan-academic-bio-stub}}
